content:
/>
II.ii.2.B.4.b
.
Storage of Original STRs
When a claims folder is established, do not return the Veteran’s STRs to a service department or the National Personnel Records Center (NPRC), unless a specific request is received.
Note
:
If the original, paper version of a Veteran’s STRs are in a RACC’s possession, that RACC must
store the STRs in the same STR jacket in which they arrived from the Veteran’s service department, and
file the STRs in the center section of the Veteran’s claims folder.
Exception
:  If the STR jacket in which STRs arrived has been destroyed, RACCs may store the STRs in
VA Form 21-4582, Service Department Records Envelope
.
Reference
:  For more information on handling requests for the return of original STRs, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, 2.B.5.a
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Restricted Records Storage and Control
citation: Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
